text: The Amazing Spider-Man 2 is a 2014 superhero-action movie directed by Marc Webb based on the Marvel Comics character Spider-Man. It is the sequel to the 2012 movie The Amazing Spider-Man. Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx, Dane DeHaan, Paul Giamatti, Martin Sheen, Denis Leary, Colm Feore, Chris Cooper, Sally Field, Chris Zylka, Marton Csokas, and Felicity Jones are in the cast. Shailene Woodley played Mary-Jane Watson in deleted scenes. Hans Zimmer composed the music for the movie. Spider-Man co-creator Stan Lee once again had a cameo appearance as a graduation guest. It was released in theaters on May 2, 2014. ==Plot== Confident in his powers as Spider-Man, Peter Parker (Andrew Garfield) embraces his new role as a hero and spends time with Gwen Stacy (Emma Stone) in between protecting New York from criminals. However, his greatest battle yet is about to begin. With the emergence of Electro (Jamie Foxx), Peter must confront an enemy far more powerful than he is. And when his old friend Harry Osborn (Dane DeHaan) returns, Peter comes to realize that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2014 action movies Category:2014 science fiction movies Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer Category:English-language movies Category:The Amazing Spider-Man (2012 movie series) Category:2010s superhero movies
title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
